location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Watercolour paint and ink pen on paperDimensions: 202 x 332mm

mods.abstract: This sketch map shows Sur and the surrounding area in Oman. Areas including Maqrimatain, Aiqa, Jabal Eed and Balad As Sur are indicated. The map also shows: the areas occupied by the four sections of the Jenebeh tribe – the Arama, the the Ghialin, the Fuwaris, and the Makhana – within Maqrimatain; and the location of the Wali’s residence and the fort of Jinah inside the village of Balad As Sur.The map includes hydrology and some indication of relief. It features the initials GPM, which presumably stand for Major George Patrick Murphy, British Political Agent at Muscat.
